textArea.heading: ‘Plantiful’ cauliflower cheese
textArea.subheading: Swapping half the cauliflower for broccoli and scattering sauteed onions on top before baking boosts plant variety.

textArea.heading: Spiced cauliflower & pomegranate salad
textArea.subheading: Cauliflower and chickpeas are roasted with fragrant garam masala to give this veg-packed salad a gently spiced warmth. Add a sprinkle of besan sev for extra crunch.
